TopicTitle: Dragging a stage in the VAB only works if you drag it to the edge of another stage

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790K CPU @ 4.00GHz 4.00 GHz | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | RAM: 32 GB

 

Ok so if I have three stages, Parachute at the top, Engine in the middle, and Decoupler at the bottom, I want to drag the stage containing the Decoupler in between the Engine and Parachute stages. However if I begin dragging and release with my mouse in the gap between those two stages, it won't work. Instead I have to drag it to just a pixel or so above the Engine stage. This makes it a bit finicky to move stages where I want them.

I would expect the stage to move if I release it with the mouse anywhere in between two stages.
